original: Öman, Aron, kyrkoherde, Tidaholm, f. 5/8/83 i Öra, Älvsb. 1., av Johan August Ö. o. Klara Larson. G. 16 m. Signe Wiberg. Barn: Gunnar f. 17, stadsnot., Bengt 20, köpm., Hans 20, försäkr :tj :man, Ingrid 22, sjuksköt., Sven 231, kont. — Stud:ex. 04, teol. fil. ex. 05, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov, folkskoll :ex. o. prästv. 08. E. o. präst i Undenäs 09, vakanskommin. i Dala 12, kommin. i Algutstorp 12 i Falköping 17, las :pred. 18, lär. v. sam-sk. där 20-25, kommin. i Annedal i Gbg 25, kyrkoh. i Tidaholm, Acklinge, Agnetorp o. Baltak fr. 29. Stiftsomb. f. diak:styr. 15, f. miss:styr. 21. Led. av Tidah. stadsfullm. 30-36, v. ordf. i folksk :styr., ordf. i Tidah.-Agnetorps kyrkofullm., i Tidah. past. kyrkostämma. Insp. f. samrealsk. fr. 32. Skr.: Ur Undenäs historia. LVO.
translated:
Öman, Aron, vicar, Tidaholm, born on August 5, 1883 in Öra, Älvsborg County, the first child of Johan August Ö. and Klara Larson. Married on 16 to Signe Wiberg. Children: Gunnar, born in 1917, city official; Bengt, born in 1920, merchant; Hans, born in 1920, insurance agent; Ingrid, born in 1922, nurse; Sven, born in 1923, accountant. 

Education: Graduated from high school in 1904, completed theology and philosophy studies in 1905, obtained a theology candidate degree, passed practical theology exams, elementary school teacher exam, and ordained as a priest in 1908. 

Career: Acting priest in Undenäs from 1909, temporary curate in Dala from 1912, curate in Algutstorp from 1912, and in Falköping from 1917, chaplain at the hospital in 1918, taught at the social society there from 1920-1925, curate in Annedal in Gothenburg from 1925, and vicar in Tidaholm, Acklinge, Agnetorp, and Baltak from 1929. Appointed deputy commissioner for the diaconal board in 1915 and for the missionary board in 1921. 

Engagements: Member of Tidaholm city council from 1930-1936, vice chairman of the elementary school board, chairman of Tidaholm-Agnetorps church council, and of Tidaholm parish church assembly. Inspector for the secondary school from 1932. 

Written works: "From Undenäs History". Also received the Order of the Sword (LVO).
